option.value: You need to surround things in quotes

option.name: descriptionText
option.value:
To start, you'll need a robot object!

Create an instance of the Robot class and store it in the variable robot.

option.name: descriptionText
option.value:
To control the motors, first you need to get a motor board

Set the board variable to the first motor board

Available Motor Boards:

  • SB123
  • SB456
Motor boards can be indexed by either their serial number or order number

option.name: descriptionText
option.value:
Time to turn on a motor!

Set the voltage of motor 0 to half power, forwards

option.name: descriptionText
option.value:
Sometimes you may want to read the power level too

Set the power of the second motor to the value of the first, without hardcoding the value

option.name: descriptionText
option.value:
To control a servo, first you need to get a servo board

Set the board variable to the servo board

Available Servo Boards:

  • SBABC
Servo boards can be indexed by either their serial number or order number

option.name: descriptionText
option.value:
Time to control a servo!

Set the power of the servo to a quarter, backwards

option.name: descriptionText
option.value:
Time to control the power board

Turn the inputs of the power board on

option.name: descriptionText
option.value:
Your robot can see using the attached webcam.

Look for markers, and store them in markers.

option.name: descriptionText
option.value:
From all the tokens you can see, you may only want the ones attached to tokens

From the list of markers, get one that's a token, and store it in token.

option.name: possibleAnswer
descriptionText
option.value:
When starting your match, it's useful to know what zone youre starting in

Get the zone of your robot and store it in the variable zone.

option.name: descriptionText
option.value:
It might be useful to disable certain things when youre actually running in a competition mode, to possibly speed up your robot.

Find out what mode your robot is in, and store it in the variable mode
